title: Ras Baraka Rises To Mantle Of Newark's New Mayor
teaser: In Newark, the New Jersey city held its first mayoral election since Cory Booker left for the U.S. Senate. Ras Baraka won, and Sarah Gonzalez of WNYC explains how the mayor-elect plans to run Newark.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
